searchPlaceholder: Where do you want to go?
hero_description: Discover all the tools we have to help you plan the perfect trip through Chile.
plan_desc: Add destinations, adjust the order, and view the full route.
save_desc: Create favorites or locations to revisit anytime.
costs_desc: Estimate tolls, fuel and public transport.
footerAboutText: We are two students from Universidad Adolfo Ib√°√±ez who developed this platform as part of our Software Design project. RutaCL was created to make exploring Chile easier and more visual, bringing together highlighted places, trip ideas and tools that help you plan routes in a clear and intuitive way.
footerContactText: If you have suggestions or found a problem, you can email us at jojuica@alumnos.uai.cl and pfrancia@alumnos.uai.cl.
plan_subtitle: Search and add Chilean cities, towns and localities to plan your route.
plan_search_hint: Only geographic locations in Chile are shown, not accommodations.
plan_warning_too_few: Add at least 2 destinations to generate an automatic itinerary.
plan_warning_too_many: The maximum number of destinations for an itinerary is 5.
favorites_greeting: Hi {{name}}, here you will see your favorites.
favorites_empty: You don't have any favorites yet. Add some from the search.

place_desc_vina_del_mar: Vi√±a del Mar is a city located in Valpara√≠so, Chile, renowned for its beaches, temperate climate and coastal scenery. Perfect for enjoying the sea and relaxing.
place_desc_valparaiso: Valpara√≠so is a historic port city on Chile's central coast, famous for its colonial architecture, picturesque hills and vibrant cultural life.
place_desc_santiago: Santiago is the capital of Chile, located in the central valley. The country's political, economic and cultural center, surrounded by the Andes.
place_desc_atacama: The Atacama Desert is one of the most arid deserts in the world, featuring surreal landscapes, volcanoes and starry skies perfect for tourism.
place_desc_torres_del_paine: Torres del Paine is a national park in Chilean Patagonia, famous for its granite mountains, glaciers and world-class trekking trails.
place_desc_moai: Easter Island is famous for the mysterious Mo√°i, monolithic statues of the ancient Rapa Nui culture. A unique destination in the Pacific Ocean.
place_desc_maitencillo: Maitencillo is a coastal locality located in Puchuncav√≠, Valpara√≠so, known for its peaceful beaches, natural pools and rural landscapes. Perfect for a relaxing getaway.
place_desc_valdivia: Valdivia is a city located in the Los R√≠os region, known for its rivers, German colonial architecture and gastronomy. A historic and cultural destination in southern Chile.
place_desc_puerto_varas: Puerto Varas is a tourist city located in the Los Lagos region, famous for its German colonial houses, black sand beaches and views of Osorno.
place_desc_puerto_montt: Puerto Montt is the capital of the Los Lagos region, known for its historic port, seafood market, typical architecture and as a gateway to Patagonia.
place_desc_osorno: Osorno is a city located in Los Lagos, surrounded by lush nature and close to Osorno Volcano. Ideal for outdoor activities and adventure.
place_desc_puerto_natales: Puerto Natales is a small city located in Magallanes, gateway to Torres del Paine. Perfect for explorers and nature lovers.
place_desc_punta_arenas: Punta Arenas is the southernmost city in Chile, located in the Magallanes region. Starting point for Antarctic expeditions and adventure destination.
place_desc_antofagasta: Antofagasta is a port city located in northern Chile, close to the Atacama Desert. Known for its beaches and as a mining center.
place_desc_iquique: Iquique is a coastal city located in the extreme north of Chile, famous for its casino, beaches, nightlife and proximity to dunes and oases.
place_desc_arica: Arica is the northernmost city in Chile, located in the Atacama Desert. Offers beautiful beaches, tropical climate and archaeological heritage.
place_desc_la_serena: La Serena is a coastal city located in the Coquimbo region, known for its beaches, colonial architecture and as a center for astronomical observation.
place_desc_coquimbo: Coquimbo is a port city located next to La Serena, famous for the Monumental Lighthouse and its beaches. Important tourist and fishing destination.
place_desc_rancagua: Rancagua is the capital of the Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins region, located in the central valley. Mining and industrial center of the country.
place_desc_talca: Talca is a city located in Maule, Chile's agricultural and wine-making center. Close to vineyards and offers wine tourism experiences.
place_desc_concepcion: Concepci√≥n is a city located in Biob√≠o, an industrial and university center. Close to beaches and natural destinations in the region.
place_desc_temuco: Temuco is the capital of the Araucan√≠a region, close to volcanoes, lakes and national parks. Cultural and historical center of the area.
place_desc_villarrica: Villarrica is a tourist town located in Araucan√≠a, famous for Villarrica Volcano, crystal-clear lakes and adventure activities.
place_desc_chillan: Chill√°n is a city located in √ëuble, famous for its hot springs, market and as an access point to Chill√°n Volcano.
place_desc_frutillar: Frutillar is a picturesque town located in Los Lagos, known for its German architecture, theater, culture and views of Osorno Volcano.
place_desc_puerto_octay: Puerto Octay is a town located in Los Lagos, surrounded by nature, with access to lakes and volcanoes. Ideal for eco-tourism activities.
place_desc_los_angeles: Los √Ångeles is a city located in Biob√≠o, in the heart of Araucan√≠a. Commercial and cultural center of the area, close to natural reserves.
place_desc_calama: Calama is a city located in the Atacama Desert, gateway to San Pedro de Atacama. Important mining center and base for exploring the arid north.
place_desc_copiapo: Copiap√≥ is the capital of the Atacama region, located in the desert. Historic and cultural center with access to mining parks and arid landscapes.
place_desc_ovalle: Ovalle is a city located in Coquimbo, close to fertile valleys and beaches. Agricultural and gastronomic center with access to nearby destinations.
place_desc_concon: Conc√≥n is a beach located in Valpara√≠so, famous for its hot springs and eroded rocks. Perfect for enjoying the sea and nature.
place_desc_papudo: Papudo is a picturesque beach located in Valpara√≠so, known for its peace, tranquil beaches and relaxing atmosphere. Ideal for escaping mass tourism.
place_desc_zapallar: Zapallar is an exclusive beach located in Valpara√≠so, famous for its exclusivity, golden sand beaches and lush vegetation.
place_desc_cachagua: Cachagua is a beach located in Valpara√≠so, known for its natural beauty, Old Island with marine fauna and tranquil atmosphere.
place_desc_quintero: Quintero is a beach located in Valpara√≠so, with easy access from Santiago. Offers beautiful beaches and varied water activities.
place_desc_algarrobo: Algarrobo is a beach located in O'Higgins, famous for the Huaso Castle and its family-friendly beaches. Traditional tourist destination.
place_desc_el_quisco: El Quisco is a beach located in O'Higgins, close to Algarrobo. Known for its tranquil beaches and coastal town atmosphere.
place_desc_cartagena: Cartagena is a beach located in Valpara√≠so, with easy access from Santiago. Offers family beaches and classic summer atmosphere.
place_desc_san_antonio: San Antonio is a port located in O'Higgins, important fishing center. Offers port experience, seafood fairs and access to nearby beaches.
place_desc_san_fernando: San Fernando is a city located in O'Higgins, close to beaches and vineyards. Tourist center with access to rural and coastal landscapes.
place_desc_curico: Curic√≥ is a city located in Maule, important agricultural and wine-making center. Base for exploring vineyards and rural valley landscapes.
place_desc_talcahuano: Talcahuano is a port located in Biob√≠o, important industrial and fishing center. Access point to nearby coastal destinations.
place_desc_tome: Tom√© is a beach located in Biob√≠o, famous for its hot springs and artistic murals. Cultural destination with bohemian atmosphere.
place_desc_lota: Lota is a beach located in Biob√≠o, with important mining history. Offers coastal landscapes and industrial heritage from the past.
place_desc_tirua: Tir√∫a is a beach located in Biob√≠o, known for its tranquility and natural beauty. Ideal for rest and connection with nature.
place_desc_pucon: Puc√≥n is a tourist town located in Araucan√≠a, famous for Villarrica Volcano, Villarrica Lake and extreme adventure activities.
place_desc_nacimiento: Nacimiento is a city located in Biob√≠o, close to natural reserves and parks with unique biodiversity.
place_desc_corral: Corral is a town located in Los R√≠os, close to Valdivia. Known for its historic fort and panoramic views of the Calle-Calle river.
place_desc_niebla: Niebla is a town located in Los R√≠os, at the mouth of the Calle-Calle River. Offers tranquil beaches and access to fluvial nature.
place_desc_pucatrihue: Pucatrihue is a beach located in Los R√≠os, known for its natural beauty and tranquil atmosphere. Ideal for families seeking peace.
place_desc_llanquihue: Llanquihue is a city located in Los Lagos, close to beautiful lakes and volcanoes. Perfect for outdoor activities and nature tourism.
place_desc_piedras_blancas: Piedras Blancas is a beach located in Los Lagos, famous for its white rock formations and spectacular views of Osorno Volcano.
place_desc_puyehue: Puyehue is a locality located in Los Lagos, close to Puyehue National Park. Offers hot springs, lakes and access to natural reserves.
place_desc_ancud: Ancud is a city located in Chilo√©, known for its historic fort, wooden churches and unique local gastronomy.
place_desc_dalcahue: Dalcahue is a town located in Chilo√©, famous for its wooden church and traditional market with authentic local products.
place_desc_castro: Castro is the capital of Chilo√©, located on a unique archipelago. Known for the San Francisco Church (UNESCO Heritage) and palafitos.
place_desc_quellon: Quell√≥n is a town located south of Chilo√©, starting point for the Carretera Austral. Offers authentic Chilo√© experience and gastronomy.
place_desc_puerto_williams: Puerto Williams is the southernmost port in the world, located in Tierra del Fuego. Starting point for Antarctic expeditions and extreme adventures.
place_desc_juan_fernandez: Juan Fern√°ndez is an archipelago located in the Pacific, famous for its unique biodiversity and as the place where Robinson Crusoe lived.
place_desc_archipelago: The Chilo√© Archipelago is a set of islands in Los Lagos, famous for its palafito architecture, wooden churches and unique culture.
place_desc_pan_azucar: Pan de Az√∫car is a national park located in Antofagasta, known for its white sand dunes contrasting with rocky cliffs.
place_desc_punta_choros: Punta de Choros is a locality located in Coquimbo, gateway to protected islands with unique marine fauna like Humboldt penguins.
place_desc_san_pedro_atacama: San Pedro de Atacama is a town located in the heart of the Atacama Desert, base for exploring surreal landscapes and geysers.
